<Heading
  as={'h1'}
  className={'openapi__heading'}
  children={'getUserAvatar'}
></Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={'get'}
  path={'/api/v1/users/{username}/avatar'}
  context={'endpoint'}
></MethodEndpoint>

getUserAvatar

<Heading
  id={'request'}
  as={'h2'}
  className={'openapi-tabs__heading'}
  children={'Request'}
></Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[
    {
      schema: { type: 'string', description: 'Username' },
      required: true,
      description: 'Username',
      name: 'username',
      in: 'path',
    },
  ]}
></ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema title={'Body'} body={undefined}></RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{
    '200': {
      description: 'User avatar',
      content: {
        'image/png': { schema: { type: 'string', format: 'binary' } },
      },
    },
    '404': {
      description: 'Avatar not found',
      content: {
        'application/json': {
          schema: {
            type: 'object',
            properties: { error: { type: 'string' } },
            required: ['error'],
            example: { error: 'An error occurred' },
            title: 'ErrorResponse',
          },
        },
      },
    },
  }}
></StatusCodes>
